name: SMASH BASH: Sukhov vs Zombies
description:
This is untold adventure of legendary Fedor Sukhov.
Red Army hero fight against horrible threat of the Undead horde.
Sukhov need to reveal secrets of the ancient technology.
Only mysterious gift from the long-forgotten age can stop undead monsters.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - movement
Left Mouse Button - shoot
R - reload
F - repair (when actual)

Game made for Ludum Dare 36 event.

Team:

Yaroslav Kravtsov - game design, production
Evgeniy "MazokPixels" Yudin - art
nEc neca - animation
Kirill "Xorboo" Korepanov - programming
Victor Smirnov - programming
Ivan Seryi - scriptwriter
Dmitry Petyakin - music, sound design
